pageContext.claim: ““The American Media has changed forever. News organizations that seemed like a big deal are now extinct.  Those that remain have now degraded themselves beyond recognition, like the New Yorker - or they've been purchased by Jeff Bezos to conduct unregistered lobbying for Amazon, like the Washington Post. It’s hard to remember that not so long ago America had prestige media outlets, but not anymore.” @TuckerCarlson   The Fake News Media is the true Enemy of the People!"”
pageContext.analysis: The Washington Post is owned by Jeffrey P. Bezos, who also, separately, owns Amazon. The Post does not lobby on behalf of Amazon.
